obliquelaunch
Class Thrower

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--obliquelaunch.Thrower
public class Thrower
extends java.lang.Object

The thrower will be something that throws up anything. It can be a cannon that throws a projectile, or it can be a player that can kick a ball.

Constructor Summary

          Creates new Thrower
 
Method Summary
 double getAngle()
          Gets the angle formed with the horizontal axis to throw up any projectile.
 double getGravity()
          Gets the gravity where the thrower will throw up any projectile.

          Gets the initial speed of the throwing of any projectile.

          Sets the angle of the throwing of a given projectile.
